name: Explore Vietnam
description: A comprehensive 10-day tour across Vietnam, from the bustling cities to scenic beaches.

destinations.name: Hanoi
destinations.description: The vibrant capital city of Vietnam, known for its history and culture.

destinations.name: Ha Long Bay
destinations.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site, famous for its emerald waters and limestone islands.

destinations.name: Hue
destinations.description: Ancient capital with historic architecture and the Perfume River.

destinations.name: Da Nang
destinations.description: A coastal city with beautiful beaches and Marble Mountains.

destinations.name: Ho Chi Minh City
destinations.description: Vietnam's bustling economic hub with a blend of modern and traditional influences.

name: European Highlights
description: An unforgettable 12-day tour of Europe's most iconic destinations.

destinations.name: Paris
destinations.description: The city of lights, known for the Eiffel Tower and rich art and culture.

destinations.name: Rome
destinations.description: Historic city with ancient ruins, including the Colosseum.

destinations.name: Vienna
destinations.description: Austria's capital, known for its classical music and Baroque architecture.

destinations.name: Amsterdam
destinations.description: Famous for its canals, tulip fields, and vibrant art scene.

destinations.name: Berlin
destinations.description: Germany's capital, known for its history, museums, and modern attractions.

name: Safari Adventure in Kenya
description: A 7-day safari tour exploring the wilderness of Kenya.

destinations.name: Nairobi
destinations.description: Kenya's capital, gateway to the safari experience.

destinations.name: Masai Mara
destinations.description: World-renowned national reserve famous for wildlife, including lions, elephants, and zebras.

destinations.name: Lake Nakuru
destinations.description: Known for its flamingos and rhino sanctuary.

destinations.name: Amboseli National Park
destinations.description: Scenic views of Mount Kilimanjaro and a variety of wildlife.
